# Changelog

## [0.2.0] - 2023-07-14

### Changed

- MSRV is now 1.60.0
- Set `default-features` to `false` for `surf` dependency.
- Updated the minimum versions of the following dependencies:
  - governor [0.6.0]
  - url [2.4.0]
  - wiremock [0.5.19]

### Added

- This changelog to keep a record of notable changes to the project.
